title: Ticket #2717: transfer_input_files doesn't follow directory symlinks
description: a merge of a bug fix for #2387 from 7.6.5 to 7.7.3 ended up making it so that transfer_input_files doesn't follow symlinks. This happened because in the stable series the function that follows symlinks is safe_open_wrapper, but in developer branch, that function is now called safe_open_wrapper_follow. Thus a merge from 7.6.5 that changed the line with the safe_open call ended up changing it from a symlink following call to one that didn't follow links.
check_ins: 2011-Dec-15 10:09   Check-in [28797]: fix safe_open_wrapper call in submit to use the new link-following version safe_open_wrapper_follow. This was broken by a merge of bugfix #2387 from stable, which doesn't have the xxx_follow versions of the safe_open code. ===GT=== #2717 ===VersionHistory:None=== bug never shipped (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
